
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53266214">
<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 wglcs9803 于 2025-6-24 11:09 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
<font size="2">时光学 音标趣味速记</font><br>
<img id="aimg_ZYtEz" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i3/3086901430/O1CN01sdHWTd1MQzLFhE8Q3_!!3086901430.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://img.alicdn.com/imgextra/i3/3086901430/O1CN01sdHWTd1MQzLFhE8Q3_!!3086901430.jpg"><br>
<font size="2"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="2">以下介绍来自网络：</font><br>
<font size="2"><font color="#000"><font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif">时光学音标书：孩子学英语的神奇工具&amp;#128218;</font></font><br>
<font color="#000"><font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif">终于有一本把英语音标讲得特别清楚的书了！这本时光学的趣味速记音标书，内容非常全面，涵盖了孩子学习英语必须掌握的发音要点。我给娃买了两本，一本放家里，一本带学校，每天记背查看都特别方便。</font></font><br>
<br>
<font color="#000"><font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif">让我八岁的儿子彻底学会了音标，绿色印刷产品，看着就舒服。书里有很多有趣的记忆方法，比如“音标趣味速记”，通过形象生动的比喻，让孩子轻松记住发音。比如形刺猬背上有两颗山楂，记噢噢噢，我的山楂被刺猬抢走了，all, ball, call, fall, autumn, August, sauce, saw, paw, dawn, or, horse, short, sport, door, floor, more, before, score, your, four /bo:1/。还有老人靠着柱子、弯着腰，记老人倚着柱子咳咳咳，key, kite, kind, king, keep, park, pork, cat, can, cold, coat, cute, cool, candy, duck, neck, black, clock, chick, pocket。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif"><font size="2"><font color="#000000"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif"><font size="2"><font color="#000000"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif"><font size="2"><font color="#000000">下载地址：</font></font></font><br>

<font face="PingFangSC-Regular, Arial, sans-serif"><font size="2"><font color="#000000"><br>
